name: Hitman Party
description:
Notice: Local multiplayer only. Online play is supported through Steam Remote Play Together and Parsec.



Join the ultimate hitman party - a fast-paced and hilarious local multiplayer game for up to 6 players. Blend in, hunt down the target and outsmart your friends in the race to become the best hitman.
Experience the thrill of multiple game modes: from the classic Hitman mode to the unique challenges of Dress-up and Bodyguard, there's always a new way to beat your friends!

Get creative and stay incognito in Hitman Party's interactive world! Fish by the river, sit quietly on a bench, drink at the bar or eat at a table - use these interactive elements to trick your opponents and avoid detection while you track down the target.

GAME MODES


BODYGUARD
Hitmen unlock clues by interacting with the world to find and kill the target. Bodyguards are here to identify and stop them.

HITMAN
Spot the target on the screen and kill it before other players do!

HUNT
Hunters need to eliminate the hunted.

DEATH MATCH
Eliminate all other players - but don't kill innocent passersby!

DRESS-UP!
Be the first to wear all the clothes displayed on the target screen by killing the pedestrians that have them!

KILL THEM ALL
Extermination: kill everything that walks! When there are only players left, the round goes into battle royale mode.
